ServiceRestart Interface Reference
HTTP Query API for TVersity Services

restart the sharing service More...

Detailed Description

restart the sharing service

Path: /general/servicerestart

Returns:
An XML documnt with one element response and two attributes status and message. The status can be either success or failure and the message describes the cause of the error in a user friendly manner.

Examples: 

  <response status="success" message="The sharing service is restarting...">
